org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class AbstractScaleLines

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AxisContainer
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractScaleLines
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Grid, RadialAngleLines

    abstract class AbstractScaleLines
extends AxisContainer
    The scale lines configuration (Grid and RadialAngleLines) defines options for the lines that run a the axis.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
